Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Thermophilin 9 (BlpDst, Gly-rich; natural AMPs; four-chain class 2b bacteriocin, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes. beta-chains: BlpUst, BlpEst, BapFst; More AMPs: thermophilin 110)

Literature Information.Literature: Shown is the alpha peptide. Three beta peptides (BlpUst, BlpEst, and BlpFst) are reported and can enhance the activity of the alpha peptide.thermophilin 110: reported with no amino acid sequence reported.Updated 7/2024
Literature Information.Author: Fontaine L, Hols P.2008
Literature Information.Title: The inhibitory spectrum of thermophilin 9 from Streptococcus thermophilus LMD-9 depends on the production of multiple peptides and the activity of BlpG(St), a thiol-disulfide oxidase.
